item.title: Quarkbällchen – Fried curd balls
item.description: “Quark” is a type of fresh dairy product. It’s usually translated as curd cheese or cottage cheese. Ingredients 420ml quark (plain yoghurt can be used as a replacement) 2 eggs 6 or 7 tbsp of sugar 2 packets of vanilla sugar 400g flour (500g if using yoghurt) 2 packets of baking powder 1L sunflower oil for frying (Optional) icing sugar (Optional) Alcohol by eye so that they do not soak up so much oil Directions Mix ingredients (quark, eggs, sugar, flour, baking powder) in one bowl.
